title: LG 190 L Direct Cool Single Door 3 Star Refrigerator  (Shiny Steel, GL-B201RPZD)

product_specification.Installation & Demo: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Refrigrator Unit and 5 Years on Compressor
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship

product_description.Moist \u2018N\u2019 Fresh: This refrigerator comes with a special lattice-type box cover that helps retain the optimum moisture level of stored food. This is done by condensing the evaporated moisture of the fruits and vegetables on the lattice itself.
product_description.Toughened Glass Shelves: You can store heavy containers as well as heavy pots and pans directly on this refrigerator’s toughened glass shelves without worrying about damaging them as they can hold weights of up to 175 kg.

review: First of all very thanks to Flipkart for timely delivery and delivery at rural like area(My village).Delivery boy was a nice person ,simple ,down to earth and very polite. Now about Refrigerator- Blindly go for it without hesitation if u are small family upto 4 people , in village up to 5 people (because in village all most everything available in fresh condition ,veg ,milk ,buttermilk ,etc and in village not that much of artificial cold drinks stored in refrigerator at home).Design and color are personal choices.performance is best.Boot space is somewhat smaller i think but good at this price point and for 190 ltr capacity. Very silent even not audible near the compressor area.Base drawer quality should be improved but not a problem at all.Overall all Value for money friends...sorry for bad English.

After 1 month uses review - : really very good product. For 10 days u will feel, it makes some noise. But after that it won't noise. It does cooling very well at no. 2 power settings. Very much satisfied. But my product is 190 L. And even deep freezer is very small. A family must need 250 L. But really recommend for 3 people. It's very good product. Go for it. See images below.

I wanna thank flipkart from my heart, product delivered on time and I wanna thank ekart as their delivery person was very humble & polite I dont know his name but Team Ekart you rock guys. This refrigerator is best, there is no noise very attractive look don't think just go for it.

great product from lg 👌👌
really awesome no sound
but it was too small
it was for only 2-3 members
product packing was good
ekart and delivery boys kept the product was excellent

Purchased the refigirator on 3rd of July. Received as per delivery date given by Flipkart and in a properly secured manner. Timely delivery by the e-kart guys and had it delivered to my door. Received without any dents or scratches.

Coming to the refigirator, it's around 36 kilos in weight with metallic side finish just like an almira and the front fascia is like finished brushed steel and is made up of plastic.

Build quality and features:

-> Timeless simple design. No fancy colour or stickers.
->The door handle is finished in chrome and is strong and sturdy. Also there is a recessed handle on top for easy door opening.
->The interiors of the refigirator look premium and the build quality is excellent.
->Strong shelves.
->Ample freezer space
->Lovely cool and fresh zone
->Classic timeless yellow ambient lighting
->Defrost button with temperature control knob
->The top cover of vegetable box is made of plastic.
->Medium size vegetable box is provided.
->Ample space provided on door for bottles.
->Egg tray is included in the top shelf holder itself.
->Two liter bottles can be fit easily
-> Strong antibacterial gasket as mentioned.
-> looks elegant and proportional in shape and size

Operation:
-> Super silent compressor & no sound at all.
-> The interior became cool within an hour of plugging in.
-> Tested for ice. It made ice in two hours which is awesomely quick.
-> Kept milk and butter in cool zone and the butter didn't melt. So kudos there LG.
-> Works on a 6amp plug and no power plug required due to less voltage usage and smart inverter compressor.
-> Working fine without a stabilizer. Go for one though if frequent fluctuations in your area.
-> wire is thick and sturdy and will be durable.

Base drawer:
-> Elegant and functional
-> Three compartments
-> Medium in size enough for little vegetables.

Negatives:

Just felt it could have been a little heavier as it moves when I open it.. hehe.. No other cons at all.. it's just a lovely piece of work by LG. Perfect family fridge

Overall impression:

I am more than satisfied with the way it is designed and the way it functions. If your on the lookout for a refigirator for a family of three or four you can go for it with blind eyes. It's that beautiful and good looking along with being super quiet and functional. I am uploading some images so you can get an idea.

Thanks for reading my review. Hope it helps you with your decision. :-)

After using approximately two month I am writing this this review. Really nice product got from flipkart and in reasonable price. The quality of the product is really good. This model of LG is really nice. Energy rating given is really true. Packing of Flipkart is good enough. Basically we want to se the quality of the product. So for little family this model is awesome. Recomend to buy. Over all very good.

I loved the product bcz in low and affordable price the product is good and excellent. Go for it..

Very nice and royal looking finish from the front, stainless steel colour is royal.
But side profile colour not great, like ok ok.
But overall looking wise good.
And performance is good because of LG, no complaint from this perfect brand.

Ideal for a small family. Compact and small. One can easily shift the refrigerator. Good cooling effect inside the refrigerator even at low settings.
Hopes to give 5 star after 2-3 months based on performance
